init: You will find that we have glued you to the seat.
Once we shove you into the depths
Your only chance at freedom is climbing up a perilous cave
We shall give you our reasoning for this punishment.
I will be leaving notes along my journey
So those who come after remember me
Today I ponder what my purpose is
I scale this well with all my failed friends around me
Yet I find that I do it with ease
Whether this should concern me I’m not sure
Though it most definitely makes me feel powerful
Nothing like being exiled into a pit just to enjoy it
I shall see whoever reads this at the top
These statues must have been made during King Salmon’s rule
Each head belongs to a great figure
Both the old and the wise
I wonder if my head would be here if Salmon still ruled
I’ve made it so much farther than all the other criminals
I am probably the greatest to ever climb this well
I can't even see the end
I will undoubtedly achieve centuries of communal effort...
